reviews.review: La verdad muy buen juego,es divertido,en algunos momentos hay que pensar bastante recomendado.

Всем советую поиграть
Очень достойная и хорошая игра

Если тебе нравится ходить в психушку за мозгами, то эта игра для тебя.
Геймплей игры состоит из
1. Минут 30 постоять, потупить.
2. Не понять, что надо сделать и просто включить noclip.
3. Понять в noclip, как это было просто.
4. Послушать axyeный саундтрек в конце. 
ВСЕМ РЕКОМЕНДУЮ ПРОЙТИ СНАЧАЛА ПЕРВУЮ ЧАСТЬ, А ПОТОМ ВТОРУЮ.

这游戏让我蹦了，让我玩3d游戏从不眩晕恶心的人吐了。这游戏让人犯恶心的原因还是让我找到了。第一个就是鼠标加速问题，他自带的移动会让鼠标加速场景模糊（这游戏设置里面关了一样存在，前提是我关了还是存在）。第二就是这个通过传送门游戏高空掉落方向的转变是一瞬间发生的，在空中会直接旋转到垂直下落。你只要多落几次你就会因空中那几次无法辨别方向的旋转而眩晕多了就恶心吐。我建议鼠标移动还是设置为其他3d游戏一样的移动方案，取消移动模糊。（设置里面没说，个人感觉到的）还有就是高空掉落旋转慢一点，给人的眼球一个缓冲时间。优化这几个，我相信这不免招来更多人玩

actually most of my reviews involve the word pew and or pew pew but this game was really great,
great story,  interesting puzzles overall id rate 9/10

Valve's best game in my opinion. The one of a kind experience that can be shared with your buddy on multiplayer. The singleplayer is perfect and workshop integration allows community to show their creativity.

mt bom, melhor portal dentre os 3. 2087, Gabriel

This is one of the best games I've ever played. The  graphics are fantastic, it runs smoothly, it's mentally stimulating, and, most importantly, it's fun. I wish Valve would return to making games. This is almost the golden standard of a video game.

By the way, if you're also interested in getting Portal (1), play it first. Much of the tension of the original game will be lost if you've already played some of Portal 2.
It's fun. Just buy it already.

This old little game has aged well, at least until now. It's objectively better than it's predecessor, and is still very fun to play and watch for the first time.
Please, allow yourself into the world and pay attention to the dialogue and surroundings. You won't regret it.

The coop gameplay was one of the best experiences I've ever had. This is a game that makes you feel clever, and gets you with silly jokes. And the portal mechanic is just really damn cool, honestly.

It also has custom maps, so the playability is immense if you're very into it.
Um dos meu jogos favoritos, recomendo bastante.
